ModMetaData.name: [Ry]Rimcraft
ModMetaData.author: Ryflamer
ModMetaData.description:
Rimcraft, a fantasy mod based upon World of Warcraft.
Feature Overview - Blood Elves, Night Elves, Orcs, Azerothian Humans, High Elves, Trolls, Forsaken Humans/Elves, Draenei, Worgen, Tauren, and Dwarves. - Each race has its own respective advantages and disadvantages. - Lore based backstories and names for each race.
This mod on it's own does nothing. Check out the top of the list of Rimcraft suggested mods to see all of the other mods that give functionality in-game.
Rimcraft is very much a work in progress, with the intent to add more custom races, armor, weapons, and everything fitting within the Warcraft universe. Constructive criticism, suggestions, and ideas are very much appreciated.
Currently looking for help regarding lore information/backstories or any form of help people are able to help with. Contributions to the project are always appreciated.
For more information or if you're interested in helping with the project, feel free to check out our discord if you have a personal question for me about the mod, or post pictures related to the mod. https://discord.gg/3Dp7Zug
Specific race change values listed here, values on the left hand side are default vanilla human values. https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1MrG2TJ-qC3HCUQsieB-Lm6vZK2D32Si1tvnuCozI1Xk/edit#gid=248905997 Keep in mind not all races listed are necessarily implemented in-game.
World of Warcraft inspired content are property of Blizzard Entertainment. Go check out their awesome MMO !
Credits to: - Ryflamer - Mostly code, and race textures. - Varethyn - for animal textures/backstories. - Christian - code for the ore/ingot system. - Falkrim Wright - for the rimcraft metals textures. - The alien framework and rimworld mod dev discord which helped a great deal in the creation of this mod.
